# Sesame Components

> A curated collection of playful, composable UI components and microinteractions for React projects. Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Motion (Framer Motion).

Sesame provides copy-paste-ready components and small microinteractions inspired by creative, award-winning web experiences. All components are open source and free for personal and commercial use.

## Additional Resources

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/ctrlcat0x/sesameui): Source code, issues, and contributions
- Interactive documentation: Open the site and navigate to `/docs` for live examples and usage
- Installation guide: `/docs/installation`
- Changelog: `/docs/changelog`

---

All components are available in interactive examples (for developers) and markdown versions suitable for LLMs and documentation tools. To fetch a markdown variant of a docs page, append `.md` to the page URL.
